title: Lucifers's Friend - Awakening  2015  ak7103
description:
LuciferÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Friend is reforming in 2015, some 20+ years after they were last together.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	The band formed in 1970 with their influential and groundbreaking self-titled album and went on to release six albums in that decade.  The band reformed in the early 80s for two albums and then briefly again in 1994 for one album.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢John Lawton had this: Ã¢â‚¬Å“The reformation of Lucifer's Friend has been a long time coming, but we all feel that the time is rightÃ¢â‚¬Â¦To get back together with the guys with whom I had worked together for so many years and recorded albums that have in many respects stood the test of time, is for me, an upcoming highlight. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re joined by Yogi Wichman on keyboards, who played on our last album Sumo Grip, but unfortunately the original drummer Addi Rietenbach died many years ago, so we will be introducing drummer Stephan Eggart into the band line-upÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

It's been a long time since they made any money so they really need the support. 

As normal go to the shows and buy the merch,thats the best way to support the artist, all of that money goes to the band. Not to the DMCA
